pronunciation: LOP, [Eng. flap. The primary sense is evidently to fall or fell, or to strike down, and I think it connected with flap.]

definitions.text:
Lop
1. To cut off, as the top extreme part of any thing; shorten by cutting off the extremities; as, lop tree its branches.With branches lopp'd wood, mountain fell'd.
2. To cut off, as exuberances; separate, as superfluous parts.Expunge the whole, lop the excrescent parts.
3. cut partly off bend down; as, lop the trees saplings of hedge.
4. To let fall; flap; as, horse lops his ears.LOP,
that which cut from trees.Else both body lop will be of little value.LOP,
